WorkItem.Description: The Will of Unbinding trinket grants a stacking buff effectively giving a permanent 990 Intellect bonus and should thus be BiS, but is valued much less by Rawr.

Comments.Message:
The similar Heart of Unliving is also broken, as it should be worth 990 hit, but the Spirit buff seems to be completely ignored (granted, it's not a good option anyway).

Overall just converting those to static stat trinkets in the item cache might be a solution though.

Spirit trinkets are absolutely not treated at all in Rawr.Moonkin, nor will they be.  If you're using a Spirit trinket, you're doing it wrong. :-P
I'll look at the Int stacking trinket.  I recently made some changes to the Intellect handling code, so I may have missed something.
Found the issue; it wasn't Moonkin, it was the item itself.  Fix is checked in in the latest source.
